name: LitMan Glass WIP
description:
[b]Thank You and possibly Goodbye![/b]

I want to say big Thank You to all of those who supported me all the way.

It was a pleasurable experience. I loved what I were doing and remember everyone who was together. There was a good days and a bad ones. Together we shared the passion to this game. But everything has its own end. My modding is not the exception.

Currently I'm mostly in Real Life project to conquer Kungsleden by foot.

Kungsleden (Kings Trail) is a hiking trail in northern Sweden, approximately 440 kilometers (270 mi) long, between Hemavan in the south and Abisko in the north.

The trip is scheduled for 2021 (at the best 2020), depending on the ability to raise funds for this trip.

If you found my Mods useful please help me my dreams come true and donate. I would be very thankful if you could donate even a little bit to raise my funding. 

Please Donate on PayPal https://www.paypal.me/kasperaitis

Depending on donations I may resume updating my Mods.  

I released all my Source files on Gitlab https://gitlab.com/kasperaitis/conan-exiles-mods if anyone wants to keep updated those Mods or release own ones.

If you need a previous version it also could be found on Gitlab https://gitlab.com/kasperaitis/conan-exiles-mods/tree/master/Compiled

[b]Latest Update. Dev Kit Version 147178.22038.[/b]
